title: Seeking electrical schematic font
content:
I've got to replicate a legend for an electrical schematic showing condo layouts

I've found this, but are there others? This one hasn't got most of the symbols I need.

[http://www.dafont.com/carr-electronic.font](http://web.archive.org/web/20150302015223/http:/www.dafont.com/carr-electronic.font "http://www.dafont.com/carr-electronic.font")
author: elzadra

comments.content: Do you have an image that shows the symbols you're looking for?
Do you have AutoCAD? It would be much easier to do a schematic in that then to try to piece together this with a font.

Sorry for the delay. Here is an scan of the symbols:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150302015223im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Scan-130221-0001_5550.jpg)
Aie, never mind. Drew them in Illustrator.
